paragraphs: As a Software Development Engineer at Trellix, I focus on data security and preventing unauthorized exfiltration of sensitive corporate information as part of the Data Loss Prevention (Windows) team. My expertise in C++ and secure systems development enables me to contribute effectively to protecting critical enterprise data.

Previously at Intel Corporation, I worked on confidential computing technologies, including Intel SGX and TDX, implementing advanced fuzzing frameworks and addressing vulnerabilities to enhance workload security.
A B.Tech graduate in Computer Science and Engineering from IIT Goa, I am dedicated to advancing innovation in data protection and secure systems.
